name: PLANT
description: code in SAP for the plant (4 digits stored as text) at which the specified product was manufactured or from which it was delivered (for example, 1020 = Twinsburg, 4000 = European Distribution Center, and 5040 = Rockwell Automation China)

If the source of a serial number was Factory Talk Product Centre (FTPC), the Transaction Plant Code represents the plant that manufactured or produced the product; Â otherwise, the Transaction Plant Code represents the plant that delivered the product per a sales order or stock transfer order.
